title: Federated's Orlando: Germany, Japan Keeping Lid on Yield(Audio)
itunes:title: Federated's Orlando: Germany, Japan Keeping Lid on Yield(Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Phil Orlando, Chief Equity Strategist at Federated Investors, weighs in on the stock market, investments, the election and yields. Broadcasting LIVE at Pershing's INSITE 2016 conference in Orlando.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
